element.name: TEnumSourceEditMode
element.short: Describes the mode of operation of the Source-Editor

element.name: TEnumSourceEditMode.esem_EditExisting
element.short: Editmode := esem_EditExisting is used to Modify an existing Source

element.name: TEnumSourceEditMode.esem_AddNew
element.short: Editmode := esem_AddNew is used to Creaate a new Source and Add/Link it to a Client-Type
